text.div:
Medicine Route of Administration - IPS

EDQM Route of Administration codes. This Value Set includes all the EDQM Standard Terms having:
[Concept Status] = ‘Current’ AND
[Concept Class] = 'route of administration' AND
[Domain] = 'Human and Veterinary'

Copyright Statement:

This artifact includes content from EDQM Standard Terms. EDQM Standard Terms are copyright European Directorate for the Quality of Medicines . Terms & Conditions in https://www.edqm.eu/en/standard-terms-database
